mapper.select: select * from product where product_index > 0 order by product_index desc, reg_date desc
mapper.update: update product set product_name=#{product_name}, product_price=#{product_price}, product_point=#{product_point}, product_color=#{product_color}, product_size=#{product_size}, product_stoke=#{product_stoke}, content=#{content}, category=#{category}, category_detail=#{category_detail} where product_index=#{product_index}
